name: F-Zero 99
description:
F-Zero 99 is a racing game developed by Nintendo. It came out on 14-09-2023. It was published by Nintendo. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
F-Zero 99 is available on Nintendo Switch.
It was produced by Shinya Saito and Takao Nakano. It was directed by Chris Polney. James Phillipsen scored the game.
